Visited and Shortest path should be the same for all heuristics (optimal paths)
This is because we are running bfs and we are exhausting the search space (creating pdb)
Time is mostly irrelevant, more complex heuristics should take longer, but
there may be slight inconsistency as observed here, because of background tasks running on the machine during computation.
(I was doing other things while the program was running.)
random
visited | plan_length | time(s)
4 | 1 | 0.0022079944610595703
10 | 3 | 0.007935762405395508
28 | 7 | 0.02908015251159668
